title: What serif face is this? Quite stylish.
content:
This seems like a nice serif face, rather slab-like, if I’m not mistaken . . .

Thanks.

author: Palatine

comments.content:
\> if I’m not mistaken …

...the sample too small. Any link or better image?
I’m afraid that’s the best I can do.

No way to tell from that. But you could write to Carol Wahler at the TDC to ask....

T

I think the sample is from the TDC’s Typography 24 annual.

The typeface is FF Eureka.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-eureka/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811074735/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-eureka/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-eureka/")

Joseph
Ahh . . . I think Joseph’s on to somthing.
